description: Defines a Note class with persistence support, including methods for serialization, deserialization, copying, and equality.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A simple entity representing a note with properties like id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, along with methods for copying, serialization, and equality checks.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a shallow copy of the Note with optional overridden fields.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Note instance from a map, typical of database retrieval.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Note instance into a map suitable for database writes.
